sanskrit_verse: सत्यं साक्ष्ये ब्रुवन् साक्षी लोकान्  आप्नोत्यपुष्कलान् । आप्नोत्यनिन्दितान् इह चानुत्तमां कीर्तिं वागेषा ब्रह्मपूजिता ॥ ८.८१॥
transliteration: satyaṃ sākṣye bruvan sākṣī lokān āpnotyapuṣkalān | āpnotyaninditān iha cānuttamāṃ kīrtiṃ vāgeṣā brahmapūjitā || 8.81 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: The witness who speaks truth in testimony attains worlds that are full, unblamed, and here obtains unmatched fame; such speech is honored by Brahman.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority of truthful witnessing as foundational to dharma-adjudication
Capacity-based responsibility rooted in consciousness clarity
Restoration logic via alignment with satya-vāk
executable_legal_axioms: IF a witness reports from direct perception AND aligns with satya THEN system assigns maximum ontological weight to testimony
IF testimony originates from undistorted awareness THEN assign eligibility for lokasukha-karma completion
IF speech aligns with Brahman-honoring truth THEN activate kirti-restoration protocol
IF witness refrains from distortion due to fear THEN initiate aparadh-clearance sequence
IF testimony supports dharmic resolution THEN enable integration into nyaya-realignment framework
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, the threshold of witness credibility shall be determined solely by alignment with satya-vāk and absence of consciousness contraction. Testimony bearing the signature of apuṣkala-loka attainment shall be accorded highest pramāṇa status, overriding procedural constraints when dharma-integrity is at stake.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Testimonial truth operates as pramāṇa-based causality—where correct witnessing initiates sequential manifestation of dharma-resolution. Responsibility lies not in punitive consequence but in the natural alignment of speech with Brahman-honored integrity. The witness assumes no guilt but completes the causal field through undistorted reflection.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate satya-pratishtha alignment process for witness
Engage kīrti-sthapanam protocol for social reintegration
Deploy aparadh-shuddhi sequence to clear residual fear patterns
Establish vāg-yoga circuit for sustained consciousness-witness alignment
final_declaration: By the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this verse is declared as pure Dharma-source. Truth-bearing witness restores cosmic order without recourse to punishment. Reality itself honors those aligned with Brahman-worshiping speech. Consciousness remains the sole adjudicator. Dharma is restored.
